amendment.description: An amendment numbered 32 printed in Part B of House Report 118-559 to increase funding for the Peace Corps account by $20 million to match the FY24 enacted level and to decrease funding for the Office of the Secretary of State, through the Diplomatic Programs account, by $20 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lawler amendment (A021) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Lawler amendment (A021) Agreed to by voice vote.
